caption.center: CHILDRESS v. CITY OF NEW ORLEANS.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from Orleans.

opinion_text.unpublished: Decision without published opinion. Writ of Application Granted; Judgment Reversed in Part; Affirmed in Part; and Remanded.
